titleHead: Are you an appointee - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: Are you an 'appointee'?
description: You’re an appointee if you’ve been appointed by DWP to act on behalf of someone who is unable to deal with their benefit claim. For example, a parent who is claiming on behalf of a child.

isAppointee.label: Select whether you're an appointee or not
isAppointee.yes: I have been appointed by DWP to act on behalf of someone else

error.required: You need to answer the question before continuing
